amendment.description: To provide a pilot program to extend the hours of commercial operations at Santa Teresa, New Mexico.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4928 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4928 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9567-9574; text: CR S9568) To provide a pilot program to extend the hours of commercial operations at Santa Teresa, New Mexico.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4928 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4928 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman.
